channel.title: Thread for the lulz
channel.description:
So I got glined from IRC for the lulz, and so I decided to open a topic about the joys of flaming. More of a philosophical discussion than anything. Why do people enjoy flaming? I find it fun to just fuck with people, gives me a power trip. You guys?
EDIT: I think there are two types of flaming. One is on inferior people just to reinforce your superiority, and the other is flaming superior people to try and bring them down. Most "bullying", or whatever you wish to call it, is of the latter in my opinion.

[quote author=sanga282 link=topic=345322.msg2663253#msg2663253 date=1234369040]

No, no, rifk. This thread isn’t supposed to be flaming… discussion and debates omg…

Like I care. Go penetrate your sister.

i heard somewhere she was fit
[/quote]I has pics

i has bandwidth to waste
[/quote]Wait til’ tomorrow, they are on my laptop.

ok i can hold off till then[/quote]
I need some pics too.

No perfection. Then we are obviously fapping to a dead chick.

item.title: Thread for the lulz
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:5, topic:261511”][quote author=Rictoo link=topic=345322.msg2662645#msg2662645 date=1234307248]
No, no, rifk. This thread isn’t supposed to be flaming… discussion and debates omg…
[/quote]
Like I care. Go penetrate your sister.[/quote]

An example of failed trolling or flaming would be an overuse of a specific insult and not being original. Since the troller knows this, I am led to believe that the flaming is not being done to affect me, which could only mean he is flaming for a benefit to himself.

Unhandled, you have unknowingly contributed to this thread.

Read full topic
